entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to AD review

Dear Guy,

Thanks for this. We will wait for Richard's Area Director input on the readiness of the content.

For the formatting, this will still need the standard header applied. Also, my understanding is this will obsolete #217, which is a header component to add.

Best regards,
Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
Checking again with Richard... apologies for the delay.
    Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
Per the standards council telecon July 1:

    1. For the authors: Please update the document with the correct header, and copyright statement. These are in the "templates" area of Redmine.

    2. For Richard, we need AD confirmation this is ready to move to public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
• File draft-nsi-signaling-and-path-finding-public-comment-v2.pdf added

Richard,

PDF version: draft-nsi-signaling-and-path-finding-public-comment-v2 uploaded and ready to go to public comment.

Headers have been checked and are correct.

Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
This has now been published. Thanks everyone for this.

    Please close this issue tracker.

    Thanks
    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
Apologies, it is version 1 that was published back in 2015. The updated version 2 now needs to be published.

    Richard - could you please check the corrected headers and approve this to be published?

    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
Sorry ... ready to go to public comment, not to publish.

    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #305: Updated NSI signaling and Pathfinding informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to initial review

The requested clarifications are in place and this version is ready to go to public comment.

I suggest that adding wording to obsolete GFD.217 are done in parallel to releasing the doc for public comments
